title: Semantically Laid Web Page
description: This project gets the learner to structure a web page semantically, thereby improving SEO and interactivity.

steps.content: Create basic HTML layout with DOCTYPE and the html tags. Inside the html tags place a body and a head title. On opening tag of html add a tag called 'lang' and set it to 'en'. This shows the base language of the website.

On the head add a meta tag with the name 'charset' and set it to 'utf-8'. Add another meta tag on the head with the name 'viewport' and set it to 'width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0. Meta tags are self closing.'
Set the title of the website to 'Semantic HTML'. On the main create 'header', 'main' and 'footer' tags.
Inside the header tag, add a h1 element with a title describing the website. This is usually the name or a brief description of the website.
Within the main tag, create at least two sections using the 'section' element. Each section should have a heading (h2) and some descriptive content.
Inside the footer tag, add copyright information or any relevant information about the website.
